bibl.title: Phraseological Variation in the Agoranomic Contracts from Pathyris.
bibl.note: Case in point: The objet in the agoranomic sale contract. - Two traditions - Egyptian and Hellenistic document types. - A merging of two traditions - parallels within common phraseology. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Variation and Change in Greek and Latin

bibl.seg: Marja Vierros, Phraseological Variation in the Agoranomic Contracts from Pathyris.
Martti Leiwo, Hilla Halla-Aho & Marja Vierros (edd.), Variation and Change in Greek and Latin = Papers and Monographs of the Finnish Institute at Athens. 17 (Helsinki, 2012) pp. 43-56.

Case in point: The objet in the agoranomic sale contract. - Two traditions - Egyptian and Hellenistic document types. - A merging of two traditions - parallels within common phraseology. - Conclusion.
